title: "Creative" Bauhaus-like geometric sans
content:
Hi, Does anyone know what this font is. It looks a bit like Washington...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225163512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_3841.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Looking for non-grunge version of "Birth of a Hero" - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alt {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225163512/http:/typophile.com/node/38335 "Go to previous forum topic") [Weird handwritten connected script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225163512/http:/typophile.com/node/38326 "Go to next forum topic")
author: MMP

comments.content: Could be [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225163512/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/itc_avant_garde_demi/?sample_text=creative&sample_size=74&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) with adjustments. But you’ll probably like [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225163512/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts).
